content.title: Term Loan under NSKFDC- Haryana
content.department: Haryana Scheduled Castes Finance and Development Corporation (HSFDC)
content.details: The scheme 'Term Loan under NSKFDC' is implemented by the Haryana Scheduled Castes Finance and Development Corporation (HSFDC) in collaboration with the National Safai Karamcharis Finance & Development Corporation (NSKFDC). Under this scheme, loans are provided to Safai Karamcharis and their dependents for any viable income-generating activities with a maximum cost of up to ₹15,00,000/- per beneficiary.
benefits: Loans of up to ₹15,00,000/- per beneficiary for various self-employment income-generating activities.
Beneficiaries can avail loans ranging from ₹10,000 to ₹15,00,000/-.
Margin money @ 10% of the project cost.
Subsidy @ 50% of the total project cost (Maximum subsidy amount is ₹10,000/-) for beneficiaries below the poverty line.
eligibility: The applicant should be a permanent resident of Haryana.
The applicant's age should be between 18 and 55 years.
The applicant should be either Safai Karamchari or his/her dependent.
documents_required: Safai Karamchari or Dependent of Safai Karamchari Certificate issued by competent authority
Two-year-old valid Driving Licence in case of vehicle loan

faqs.question: Who implements the scheme?
faqs.answer: The scheme is implemented by the Haryana Scheduled Castes Finance and Development Corporation (HSFDC) in collaboration with the National Safai Karamcharis Finance & Development Corporation (NSKFDC).

faqs.question: What is the maximum loan amount per beneficiary under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The maximum loan amount is ₹15,00,000 per beneficiary.

faqs.question: What types of income-generating activities are covered under the scheme?
faqs.answer: Activities include auto repair and spare parts shops, electrical goods workshops, leather footwear manufacturing units, beauty parlors, welding works, carpentry, photography, grocery shops, sanitary supply stores, ready-made garments, cyber cafes, band parties, tent houses, etc.

faqs.question: What is the age requirement for applicants?
faqs.answer: Applicants must be between 18 and 55 years of age.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to apply for the loan?
faqs.answer: The applicant should be a permanent resident of Haryana and either a Safai Karamchari or their dependent.

faqs.question: Is there an income limit for applicants?
faqs.answer: No, there is no income limit for applicants.

faqs.question: What is the range of loans that beneficiaries can avail?
faqs.answer: Beneficiaries can avail loans ranging from ₹10,000 to ₹15,00,000.

faqs.question: Is there a subsidy provided under the scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, a subsidy of 50% of the total project cost (up to a maximum of ₹10,000) is provided for beneficiaries living below the poverty line.

faqs.question: What is margin money in this scheme?
faqs.answer: The Corporation provides margin money at 10% of the project cost.

faqs.question: How to apply for the loan?
faqs.answer: Eligible applicants can apply online through the Antyodaya-SARAL Portal or visit the official HSFDC website.

faqs.question: What happens after submitting the loan application?
faqs.answer: The applications are scrutinized and verified by District Managers. Eligible applications are then sent to NSKFDC for loan sanction.
